org.knime.base.node.io.database.connection.util

Class DefaultDatabaseConnectionSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.knime.core.node.port.database.DatabaseConnectionSettings
      • org.knime.base.node.io.database.connection.util.DefaultDatabaseConnectionSettings

  • public class DefaultDatabaseConnectionSettings
extends DatabaseConnectionSettings
    Extension of DatabaseConnectionSettings the allows the user to specify the individual parts of the database URL (i.e. hostname, port, and database name).
    Since:
    2.10
    Author:
    Thorsten Meinl, KNIME.com, Zurich, Switzerland
